The purpose study compare effect significant dietary restriction , exercise , combination reduce knee inflammation compressive force obese overweight adult knee OA . The study also examine diet exercise affect everyday function pain level , well extent weight loss necessary slow OA disease progression . This study last 18 month . During Months 7 18 , participant attend group session every two week individual session every 3 month . Throughout study , participant record food beverage intake daily log collect monthly . Group 2 3 participant partake three , 60-minute exercise session per week duration study . The exercise session incorporate aerobic exercise resistance training . Participants also encourage exercise home . Body weight monitor monthly . Follow-up evaluation participant occur Months 6 18 , screen procedure repeat .
